column4: I'm trying to patch my wireless (broadcom) drivers...The doc says to drop the patch in the kernel root and run n the terminal...I go to what I think is my kernel root but im restricted

I'm trying to patch my broadcom wireless drivers to inject...i found the bcm43xx-injection patch but i need to place it in my kernel root and patch from terminal but my access is restricted when i try to use (what I THINK) is the kernel root
i heard a mention of sudo su
it works, but don't use it ;)
